mapper.insert: insert into energy_usage (measure_date, tag_id, usage_value, adapt_unit_price, energy_cost) values (#{measureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tagId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usageValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adaptUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{energyCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select measure_date, tag_id, usage_value, adapt_unit_price, energy_cost from energy_usage

SELECT sum(A.usage_value) as tagUsage, sum(A.energy_cost) as tagCost FROM paper_dt.energy_usage A, paper_dt.tag B WHERE A.tag_id = B.tag_id AND A.measure_date BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')," " , "00:00:00") AND now() AND B.energy_type_id = #{tagEnergyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
